matter.summary: Maya Chen slipped on a puddle near the produce misters at Sunrise Market on February 11, 2024, injuring her right ankle and wrist.
matter.description: Client reported no warning cones or signage and noted that employees had been mopping minutes earlier.

documents.title: Store Incident Report
documents.summary: Assistant manager recorded moisture buildup beneath the produce display and acknowledged prior customer complaints about slick tiles.
facts: CCTV footage captured the fall and delayed response by staff.

issues: Premises liability â€“ failure to maintain safe conditions
strengths: Store emails show earlier complaints about the same hazard.
weaknesses: Client delayed seeking treatment for five days.
evidentiary_gaps: Need maintenance logs for the week preceding the fall.
